item.description:
NEBBC member, Jennifer Guilmain Bennoch, reaches out to us with the following:

Happy Holidays! I would like to ask you all to help me in trying to put Christmas packages together for 3 bully-friendly rescues: Julie Adams, Rescuing Missouri's Unwanted Dogs, (non-profit organization) (http://www.facebook.com/JulieAdamsDogRescuer?ref=ts&fref=ts) who partners with PAWS New England (http://www.pawsnewengland.com/), bringing dogs from MO to adoptive/foster homes in New England; and ACE Fitchburg (http://www.ace-fitchburg.org/), who finds homes for dozens of pitbulls each year, as well as focuses largely on community outreach & education.

If any you would be willing to donate food, leashes, blankets, treats, gift cards to amazon.com, toys, etc., anything to help the dogs and cats out there that don't have loving homes, I will be willing to pick up from you if you live close by, or I can give you the address and you can send it.

I will also box the donations up and get them out the door to their respective rescues! I would like to have everything for this drive collected by December 12th so I can get them to their destinations by Christmas!

I have created a group on facebook to keep in touch & coordinate. Please join if you're on facebook & are able to donate: http://www.facebook.com/groups/455850697793842/?ref=ts&fref=ts.

My personal facebook is http://www.facebook.com/jennifer.bennoch.

Please email me direct at jennifer.bennoch@facebook.com with any questions or to arrange drop-off/pick-ups.

Thanks for all your help and please email me with any questions. If you would like to speak on the phone, email me & I will give you my number. I hope to give the animals of these rescues a great holiday!

If this goes well, this is something I would like to repeat every two months with different rescues.

Thanks again,

Cassie-Leigh Stock for Jennifer Guilman Bennoch
item.name: Toys~N~Stuff for Pups!
